response.job_title: PhD student in Automatic Control at Cinvestav. Msc in Electrical Engineering from Cinvestav.
response.summary:
I'm an Electronic Engineer from Universidad Nacional de Colombia and MSc in Electrical Engineering from Centro de Investigación y Estudios Avanzados, in México City. Currently, I'm working towards my Ph.D. degree in Automatic Control. My research interest is focused on feedback regulation of linear and non-linear systems, adaptive control strategies, and their implementation on hardware architectures.

I have experience in the industry as a project engineer in an automation development company. My main task was the development of control systems for water treatment plants, solar energy production plants, and gas distribution plants, by the use of instrumentation and PLC programming. In addition, I have experience in the development of high-performance HMI and was responsible for the implementation of the monitoring system using high-performance HMI philosophy at the main gas distribution company in Bogotá, Colombia.
response.skills: Lingua spagnola, Robotica, Controllo dei processi, SCADA, Lingua italiana, Lingua inglese, Troubleshooting, PLC, Programmazione, Progettazione sistemi di controllo, Automazione, Controllore logico programmabile, Programador, Capacidad de análisis, Automatización industrial, Autoaprendizaje, Investigación y desarrollo, Ingeniería, Innovación en productos, Inglés

profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for weight measurement devices development for different applications, with an emphasis on the food industry. The main tasks were focused on:
- PCB design for signal processing based on ATMEL technology.
- Software design according to customer's needs. (Programming in C++ and Processing)
- PCBs build and test.
- Manufacturing process optimization. 
- Repairing and maintenance of weight meausement devices.
profile_positions.title: Development department Director.
